channel.title: Abouts on d.kens
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on d.kens

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a husband, father of three (four if you count my dog). Former fighter pilot. Degree in Aerospace Engineering and post-grad studies in military science and international relations. I’m also an ex-pat living in Denmark. Yes, the taxes are high, but the standard of living is worth it.

item.title: Colophon
item.description: I write and edit this site in Emacs. But that’s not the whole story… Here’s what I use to make this site: Emacs 29.3 Org mode Hugo (using typography theme) github.io After a little setup, I only need to write|edit in one org-mode file, save, and push.
